sponsor.partnerMessage: Ledger offers on-demand access to rent tech-enabled meeting rooms and workspaces in a state of the art building anchored in the heart of Downtown Bentonville. To learn more about shared workspaces click HERE.

posts.title: Destination Restaurant Coming To Rogers
posts.content:
The lovely people behind Tula, an authentic Mexican food restaurant in Fayetteville, are opening a new restaurant in Rogers called Loma. 

  • Expanding: Loma will be in Pinnacle Rogers and be an extension of the vision behind Tula — a destination restaurant, an experience in craft and culture. Loma will “push the envelope” on elevated Mexican dining with handcrafted cocktails. 
  • Stay tuned: The restaurant is currently under construction and will open sometime in the fall. Follow the progress on social media for updates. 

See the beautiful new space HERE.

posts.title: NWACC LIFE Program Receives Walton Family Foundation Funds
posts.content:
The Walton Family Foundation recently granted the LIFE Program at Northwest Arkansas Community College (NWACC) $432,883 to grow the program’s efforts. 

  • New paths: LIFE is a near-peer mentorship program that aims to empower students while presenting them with quality higher educational opportunities and creating “an atmosphere of acceptance and cultural celebration.”
  • Side by side: The target group of LIFE is Latino and Hispanic students, but the program will help any high school student. 90% of the students LIFE serves are first-generation in college, and they’re all mentored by “near-peers,” young NWACC college students who are relatable and relevant. With its latest funding, the program will continue its outreach, providing opportunity and community to students in our area. 

Learn more HERE.

posts.title: Eureka Springs Recommended Place To 'Run Wild'
posts.content:
Eureka Springs was recently named a "must-visit location for curious minds" by the Run Wild My Child blog. 

  • Exploring: In the blog, the author mentions adventures downtown, Beaver Lake, a historic train ride from the city and back, Turpentine Creek (a 450-acre refuge for big cats), and much more! There is so much fun to be had in Eureka Springs, and it's a perfect spot for a quick end-of-summer getaway. 
  • Never tire: Eureka has plenty of hiking and biking trails amidst beautiful scenery, delicious dining options, and unique architecture and city streets to explore! 

Read the Run Wild My Child Blog HERE for a first-hand experience of a grand adventure, and take notes!

posts.title: Ozark Compost Makes Sustainable Living Easy
posts.content:
Ozark Compost & Swap is on a mission to make sustainable living convenient through doorstep composting and package-free product delivery. Already, the company has diverted over 20,000lbs of residential food waste from landfills. 

  • Composting: Ozark Compost & Swap does all the dirty work for you by delivering a 5-gallon bucket to your doorstep to be filled with compostable items, then picks up the bucket and swaps it for a clean one. All you have to do is choose a bi-weekly or weekly pick-up!
  • Refillable Products: The company offers refillable Airship coffee delivery and refillable household cleaning products in their effort to eliminate single-use plastics. 

Sign up HERE and use the discount code NWADAILY to receive a complimentary one-month trial of a bi-weekly pick-up.

posts.title: NWA Naturals To Play 12 Home Game Stretch
posts.content:
The Northwest Arkansas Naturals are well into their 2022 season with 109 games (64-55) under their belts. The following two weeks are a great time to see them play, as they’re returning to Arvest Ballpark today for a stretch of 12 home games in 13 days. 

  • Play ball: The first six games will be against the San Antonio Missions; the second six against the Springfield Cardinals. Each day at Arvest Ballpark will feature promotions such as food and beverage deals, giveaways, and special event days. 
  • Flash sale: Don’t miss out on the Dugout Premium tickets for the last three Tuesday home games of the year for $20. That’s $15.25 off, and brats are only $1 on Tuesdays! The offer is online only and ends at 2p today. 

Click HERE for more information and tickets.

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• Adventure here: A great list of favorite local spots in NWA to share.
  • Moving on up: Check out the NWA Business Journal’s 2022 Forty Under 40 class. 
  • Art museum: Eureka Springs is on track to establish a permanent Museum of Eureka Springs Art. 
  • Public transportation: Demand for the Ozark Regional Transit’s on-demand service has tripled since its launch earlier this year.
  • Wildlife: Two Arkansas commissions plan to grant $808,000+ for wildlife conservation education programs.
  • Collab: Let's get your story out by putting you in the newsletter. Check out our advertising deals here.
